products.title: Oregon Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect Fit Oregon Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Hazel Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect Fit Hazel Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: A dark brown shade, the Hazel 25mm Perfect Fit blind will be the final part of your interior jigsaw. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating brown headrail and a brown bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand.

products.title: Auburn Perfect Fit

products.productdescription: A dark brown shade, the Auburn 25mm Perfect Fit blind will be the perfect finishing touch for any room. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating brown headrail and a brown bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand.

products.title: Moscow Oak Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Moscow Oak Woodline 9409 Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.productdescription: Red Chestnut Woodline 9407 Perfect Fit Blind

products.title: Luna Blackout Luna Walnut Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Luna Blackout Luna Walnut  Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Luna Blackout Luna Walnut Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Caramel
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Caramel Perfect Fit Venetian Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Perfect Fit Venetian Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 180mm Max Width: 1300mm
 	Min Drop: 140mm Max Drop: 2000mm
 	Slat Composition: Aluminium
 	Slat Widths Available: 25mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Tensioned (lift bottom bar to raise/lower blind, wand to tilt slats).
